sdata.j: ↑野原↑↓のはら↓の↑大木↑↓たいぼく↓に|↑落雷|↑↓らくらい↓があった。
sdata.e: A big tree in the field was struck by lightning.

sdata.j: ピカッと↑光↑↓ひか↓るのも↑怖↑↓こわ↓いのですが、どうしても↑音↑↓おと↓が↑怖↑↓こわ↓いで、↑一↑↓いち↓↑度↑↓ど↓↑家↑↓か↓に|↑落雷|↑↓らくらい↓してからさらに↑苦手↑↓にがて↓になりました。
sdata.e: It's also scary when the lightning strikes across the sky, but what's really scary is the sound. Once, my house was struck by lightning and since then I've become even more scared.
